examples: an amber light illuminated the room
he admired the gold of her hair

definitions.text: a soft yellow malleable ductile (trivalent and univalent) metallic element; occurs mainly as nuggets in rocks and alluvial deposits; does not react with most chemicals but is attacked by chlorine and aqua regia

examples: Whilst that for which all virtue now is sold, and almost every vice--almighty gold

definitions.text: something likened to the metal in brightness or preciousness or superiority etc.
examples: the child was as good as gold
she has a heart of gold

definitions.text: made from or covered with gold
examples: the gold dome of the Capitol

definitions.text: having the deep slightly brownish color of gold
